capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is a bit of a mix between being a pure-blood wizard and having some non-magical heritage. I think it's pretty interesting that he has this unique combination of traits. It definitely makes him stand out from other wizards in the series.

I think that's part of what makes him so relatable to people like me who don't come from traditional magical families.
